verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"If <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> and <S%H4603>commits<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and deals <S%H3584>falsely<s%> with his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%> in a matter of <S%H6487>deposit,<s%> or of <S%H8667>bargain,<s%> or of <S%H1498>robbery,<s%> or has <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> his <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%>

or has <S%H4672>found<s%> that which was <S%H9>lost,<s%> and dealt <S%H8267>falsely<s%> <S%H7650>therein,<s%> and swearing to a <S%H8267>lie;<s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of all these things that a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> <S%H2398>sinning<s%> <S%H2007>therein;<s%>

then it shall <S%H2398>be,<s%> if he has sinned, and is <S%H816>guilty,<s%> he shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H1500>that<s%> which he took by <S%H1497>robbery,<s%> or the <S%H6233>thing<s%> which he has <S%H6231>gotten<s%> by <S%H6487>oppression,<s%> or the deposit which was <S%H6485>committed<s%> to <S%H9>him,<s%> or the lost thing which he <S%H4672>found,<s%>

or any thing about which he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H8267>falsely;<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> it even in <S%H7218>full,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a fifth <S%H2549>part<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H5414>it.<s%> To him to whom it belongs he shall give <S%H3117>it,<s%> in the day of his being found <S%H819>guilty.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> concerning <S%H259>whatever<s%> he <S%H6213>does<s%> to become <S%H819>guilty.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8451><s%> 'This is the law of the burnt <S%H5930>offering:<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> shall be on the <S%H4169>hearth<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> all <S%H3915>night<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be kept burning on <S%H3344>it.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4055>garment,<s%> and he shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> upon his <S%H1320>body;<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>remove<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> from where the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall take <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3318>carry<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

The <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> on <S%H3518>it,<s%> it shall not go out; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on it every <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and he shall lay the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon <S%H6999>it,<s%> and shall burn on it the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>
<S%H784>Fire<s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> it shall not go <S%H3518>out.<s%>

<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the meal <S%H4503>offering:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H7311>take<s%> from there his <S%H7062>handful<s%> of the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> of the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and of its <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and all the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> which is on the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> as its <S%H234>memorial,<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

That which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of it <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat.<s%> It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> without <S%H4682>yeast<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

It shall not be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it as their <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my offerings made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> as the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and as the trespass <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2706>it,<s%> as their portion <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> from the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"This is the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> which they shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he is <S%H4886>anointed:<s%> the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8548>perpetually,<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

It shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> in a <S%H4227>griddle.<s%> When it is <S%H7246>soaked,<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H935>in.<s%> You shall offer the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> in <S%H8601>baked<s%> <S%H6595>pieces<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> that will be in his place from among his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H2706>it.<s%> By a statute <S%H5769>forever,<s%> it shall be <S%H3632>wholly<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Every meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be wholly <S%H3632>burned.<s%> It shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8451><s%> 'This is the law of the sin <S%H2403>offering:<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> is <S%H7819>killed,<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> shall be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> who offers it for <S%H2398>sin<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H398>it.<s%> It shall be eaten in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

Whatever shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%> When there is any of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on a <S%H899>garment,<s%> you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> that on which it was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

But the <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> in which it is <S%H1310>boiled<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and if it is <S%H1310>boiled<s%> in a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> it shall be <S%H4838>scoured,<s%> and <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H6944>it:<s%> it is most <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

No sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> of which any of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H398>Place,<s%> shall be eaten: it shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
